resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157779</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157779</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2608</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Seasonal changes in position of the earth with respect to the sun</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Saisonänderungen in Position der Masse in Bezug 
auf die Sonne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Changements saisonniers en position de la terre en
ce qui concerne le soleil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mudanças seasonal em posição da terra com 
respeito ao sol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cambiamenti stagionali nella posizione della terra
riguardo al sole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εποχιακές αλλαγές στη θέση της γης όσον αφορά τον 
ήλιο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cambios estacionales en la posición de la tierra 
con respecto al sol</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which shows the position of the earth with respect to the sun at different seasons of the year, and its effect on the length of the day</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">seasons</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die die Position der Masse in 
Bezug auf die Sonne an den unterschiedlichen Jahreszeiten des Jahres 
zeigt und sein Effekt auf die Länge des Tages</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui montre la position de la terre 
en ce qui concerne le soleil à différentes saisons de l'année, et 
son effet sur la durée le jour</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que mostre a posição da terra com 
respeito ao sol em estações diferentes do ano, e seu efeito no 
comprimento do dia</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che mostra la posizione della terra
riguardo al sole alle stagioni differenti dell'anno ed il relativo 
effetto sulla lunghezza del giorno</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που εμφανίζει τη θέση της γης όσον 
αφορά τον ήλιο στις διαφορετικές εποχές του έτους, και επίδρασή
της στο μήκος της ημέρας</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que muestra la posición de la 
tierra con respecto al sol en diversas estaciones del año, y su 
efecto sobre la longitud del día</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Jahreszeiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">saisons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estações</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">stagioni</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εποχές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estaciones</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <status>
            <source>statusValues</source>
            <value>final</value>
          </status>
          <contribute>
            <role>

            </role>

version:3.0

org:Israel Ministry of Education
end:vcard</entity>
            <date>

            </date>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>

            <entry>ILMoE2608</entry>
          </identifier>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
version:3.0
fn:Israel Ministry of Education
n:Israel Ministry of Education
org:Israel Ministry of Education
end:vcard</entity>
            <date>
              <dateTime>2009-02-20</dateTime>
            </date>
          </contribute>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>web page</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="en">14-18</string>
            <string language="x-t-lre">14-18</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <context>
            <source>LRE.contextValues</source>
            <value>compulsory education</value>
          </context>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>learner</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">edumedia</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>372</id>
              <entry>
                <string language="en">earth sciences</string>
              </entry>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>

    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>157779</entry>
